abstract: The 13 percent gain in quarterly net income was in line with Wall Street expectations.
snippet: The 13 percent gain in quarterly net income was in line with Wall Street expectations.
lead_paragraph: Verizon Wireless, the nation’s largest cellphone carrier, is not gaining as many new contract subscribers as it once was. But its profit remains strong thanks to swelling revenue from mobile data — the fees it collects for Internet use — and healthy smartphone sales.

headline.main: Verizon’s Profit Rises as Subscribers Grow More Slowly
headline.print_headline: Verizon’s Profit Rises as Subscribers Grow More Slowly
